00100 TICK RealTimeClock::getNextTick() {
00101   mutex_type::scoped_lock guard(m_lock);
00102   
00103   if( m_started ) {
00104     double howLate = -timeLeft();
00105 
00106     if( howLate>=0.0 ) {
00107       double ratio = howLate/m_floatTick;
00108       int tickIncr = 1+static_cast<int>(std::floor(ratio));
00109       
00110       m_tick += tickIncr;
00111       setNextTickDate(tickIncr);
00112       // If more than 10% late indicate the issue in the log
00113       if( ratio>=0.1 ) {
00114        std::ostringstream oss;
00115        oss<<"Clock]["<<m_tick;
00116        m_log->syslog(oss.str())<<howLate<<" secs late."<<std::endl;
00117       }
00118     }
00119   }
00120   return m_tick;
00121 }

00125 TICK RealTimeClock::timeToTick(time_t secs, suseconds_t usecs) const {
00126   timeval tv;
00127   TICK current;
00128   double delta;
00129 
00130   tv.tv_sec = secs;
00131   tv.tv_usec = usecs;
00132   
00133   {
00134     mutex_type::scoped_lock guard(m_lock);
00135     delta = to_double(tv-m_nextTickDate);
00136     current = m_tick+1;
00137   }
00138   delta /= tickDuration();
00139   current += std::floor(delta+0.5); // do a rounding to reduce precision impact
00140   return current;
00141 }

00143 double RealTimeClock::tickToTime(TICK cur) const {
00144   TICK current;
00145   double next;
00146   {
00147     mutex_type::scoped_lock guard(m_lock);
00148     next = to_double(m_nextTickDate);
00149     current = m_tick+1;
00150   }  
00151   double d_tick = cur-current;
00152   d_tick *= tickDuration();
00153 
00154   return next+d_tick;
00155 }

00158 double RealTimeClock::timeLeft() const {
00159   timeval tv;
00160   getDate(tv);
00161   return to_double(m_nextTickDate-tv);
00162 }

00164 double RealTimeClock::getSleepDelay() const {
00165   if( m_started ) {
00166     double delay;
00167     TICK tick;
00168     {
00169       mutex_type::scoped_lock guard(m_lock);
00170       delay = timeLeft();
00171       tick = m_tick;
00172     }
00173     if( delay<0.0 ) {
00174       // If we are already late log it
00175       std::ostringstream oss;
00176       oss<<"Clock]["<<tick;
00177       m_log->syslog(oss.str())<<(-delay)
00178                            <<" secs late before sleep."
00179                            <<std::endl;
00180       delay = 0.0;
00181     }
00182     return delay;
00183   } else 
00184     return Clock::getSleepDelay();
00185 }
